attributes.action: Perjury Act 1911- to prosecute those who make False statements to seek attention
attributes.additional_details: Truth is there for all to read; so why is somebody allowed to abuse the law. What does that teach our children. Would I be allowed to make an accusation on member of the Royal Family the PM and have them arrested NO, where is the equality in sex / class. The police the courts have damaged mine and thousands of other family's futures. I would rather die trying to prevent somebody anybody going through what I did, its easy to walk away and say NO so please say YES please help the crown Justice
attributes.background: Justice;what does that mean for me;and how can that help me; equality what is the purpose of this word.If this that we are all treated the same No discrimination,Then why was I falsely arrested 25 times over a 5-year period,controlled by the mother of my children,why has she and others been allowed

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could start a new petition asking for a minimum custodial sentence to be introduced for perjury, if that's what you want to happen.
